application.name: dawnfc2isis
application.brief: Import PDS formatted DAWN FC EDR or RDR image cube into Isis format cube
application.description: This program will import a PDS formatted DAWN Framing Camera (FC) level 1 (EDR) or level 2 (RDR) image into an Isis cube. A DAWN RDR file contains a single image object and will be written to the file specified by the TO parameter. The DAWN EDR file can contain multiple image objects. Until we have further information about the frame image objects in the EDR, this program is going to ignore them and only process the main image object. The main EDR image object will be written to the file specified by the TO parameter.

history.change: The program now automatically flips the image in the line direction.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.brief: Input PDS formatted DAWN EDR or RDR file
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the DAWN EDR or RDR filename. This file must contain the PDS labels.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the output filename
